<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script deletes the plan records which are not valid for the plan based on filter condition and
			table.
		</description>
        <name>Clean up plan records</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var plan = new GlideRecord('sm_maint_plan');
plan.addActiveQuery();
plan.query();
var CLEANUP_PLANRECORDS_EVENT = "cleanup.planrecords";
var EMPTY_STRING = "";
while (plan.next()) {
    var scheduleGr = new GlideRecord("sm_schedule");
    scheduleGr.addQuery("active", true);
    scheduleGr.addQuery("plan", plan.sys_id);
    scheduleGr.query();
    while (scheduleGr.next()) {
        gs.eventQueue(CLEANUP_PLANRECORDS_EVENT, scheduleGr, EMPTY_STRING, EMPTY_STRING, EMPTY_STRING);
    }
}]]></script>
